hadith.text: Qatada asked Anas which Supplication Allah's Apostle (ï·º) frequently made. He said:The supplication that he (the Prophet made very frequently is this:" O Allah, grant us the good in this world and the good in the Hereafter and save us from the torment of Hell-Fire."
